page.title: 05Flora and Fauna
page.content: We went to{Sefton Park Lake}on 23.5.85 and collected samples of the animals and plants. We used nets to scrape the lake bottom . We emptied the nets into white trays and then collected the specimens in sample bottles. The next day we put the samples in petri dishes and examined them using hand lenses and microscopes. We found and identified the following species: {Water crowfoot}(ranunculus aquatilis), {lesser duckweed}(lemna minor),{ {filamentus alga}(cladophora),{ {worms}(annelids),{leeches}(pisicola geometra & erpodbella octoculata),{ {crustaceans, mayfly nymphs}(cloen dipterum & baelsis rhodomi,{ {fly larvae}(aedes,chironomus),{ {water bugs}(corixa geoffroyi),{ {mites}(arachnids) and {wandering snails}(limnaea pereger).
